https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/q8wfibOTYclesNljoazDhdT0IgJ.jpg From May to December 2014, EXO toured Asia for their first concert tour EXO from Exoplanet #1: The Lost Planet. For the Japan leg of the tour, the popular K-pop boy band held nine sold-out concerts in three cities â€“ Fukuoka, Tokyo and Osaka. Catch the boys' hit songs and exciting dance performances with this live video release of their Tokyo concert! EXO Planet #1 - THE LOST PLANET in JAPAN
